title: An Old Woman's Last Prophecy
description: Elf-kind is on the verge of extinction, but only one old woman even suspects it. She shudders to think what will happen as a troublesome prophecy escapes her. Daring not to whisper its existence, and knowing she will be killed for uttering it, she feels something strange now tingling in her fingers and toes. The darkness knows . . .  The hunt for her prophesied boy, the only one who can save the elves, has begun.
author: J.A.  Clark
